TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Harawan, title = Harawan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harawan} }

S.FORM: alang Harawan ga niya mki sku Karing Keng atu Buri go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 203 buwan, 519 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 501 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 18 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 88%, binah lihuyan s'uli 8%. maki qu ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Harawan hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Harawan hya' ga Angcoh. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Harawan ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Harawan ga niya mki sko Karing Keng ato Bori go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 203 bowan, 519 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 501 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 18 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 88%, binah lihoyan s'oli 8%. maki qo ngasal bziran. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay 'zil na Harawan hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Harawan hya' ga rgyax. tay mkraya' na Harawan hya' ga Angcoh. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. hasisyo maki 1 hasisyo. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan qalang Harawan ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
